statements: SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_detection_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM fraud_detection_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_detection_transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_transactions WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_detection_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM fraud_detection_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM fraud_detection_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE id = 1001;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY last_transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT id, amount, account_id FROM transactions WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN accounts ON transactions.account_id = accounts.account_id;
SELECT account_name, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM accounts GROUP BY account_name HAVING total_balance > 5000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, location FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT pattern_id, user_id, pattern_description FROM fraud_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 'a123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE location='New York'
SELECT username, email FROM users LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM transactions
SELECT users.username, transactions.amount, transactions.location FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT flagged_transaction_id, flag_reason FROM flagged_transactions WHERE flag_reason LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;

SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT pattern_name, min_amount, max_amount FROM transaction_patterns;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM suspicious_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, min_amount, max_amount FROM transaction_patterns WHERE min_amount < 500 AND max_amount > 1000;
